<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TraceGVPlacement controls messages for all builds. For builds with assertions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (debug or release), messages are also controlled by the usual debug flags</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (e.g. -debug and -debug-only=globallayout)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63" lineLink="#a3e9dc98d250ba1568f2625eabb92f7f5"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#define TRACE&#95;TO(s, X) s &lt;&lt; X</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#ifdef NDEBUG</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#define TRACE(X)                                                               \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">  do &#123;                                                                         \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">    if (TraceGVPlacement) &#123;                                                    \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">      TRACE&#95;TO(errs(), X);                                                     \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">    &#125;                                                                          \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">  &#125; while (false)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72" lineLink="#a638b671f4fa00cd5267c8df6c19c4477"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#define TRACE(X)                                                               \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">  do &#123;                                                                         \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">    if (TraceGVPlacement) &#123;                                                    \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">      TRACE&#95;TO(errs(), X);                                                     \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">    &#125; else &#123;                                                                   \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">      LLVM&#95;DEBUG(TRACE&#95;TO(dbgs(), X));                                         \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">    &#125;                                                                          \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">  &#125; while (false)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Returns true if the section name is such that the symbol will be put</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in a small data section.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For instance, global variables with section attributes such as &quot;.sdata&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &quot;.sdata.&#42;&quot;, &quot;.sbss&quot;, and &quot;.sbss.&#42;&quot; will go into small data.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86" lineLink="#adfc4891114114529b51c8386e89110dc"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#adfc4891114114529b51c8386e89110dc">isSmallDataSection</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Sec) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sectionName is either &quot;.sdata&quot; or &quot;.sbss&quot;. Looking for an exact match</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// obviates the need for checks for section names such as &quot;.sdatafoo&quot;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Sec == </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;.sdata&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> || Sec == </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;.sbss&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> || Sec == </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;.scommon&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If either &quot;.sdata.&quot; or &quot;.sbss.&quot; is a substring of the section name</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then put the symbol in small data.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Sec.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a83a294111af6d4412163b209725ca556">contains</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;.sdata.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) || Sec.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a83a294111af6d4412163b209725ca556">contains</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;.sbss.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">         Sec.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a83a294111af6d4412163b209725ca556">contains</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;.scommon.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97" lineLink="#aa138e0811cbed9e6c483778ff22f5535"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="#aa138e0811cbed9e6c483778ff22f5535">getSectionSuffixForSize</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
